channel.title: LT4 on Go Conference 2021 Spring
channel.description: Recent content in LT4 on Go Conference 2021 Spring

item.title: How do I made a powerful cache system using Go
item.description: I’m Træfik user since v1.4 but there was no caching system. I scrolled over the internet to know if any solution exists but nothing appear then I decided to write my own Træfik cache system. I discovered Go language but didn’t have any time to follow multiples tutorials to learn it. But one day I discovered Træfik reverse-proxy project when I wanted to switch my infrastructure into fully dockerized one.
